sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20788
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/inc/ZenturHSM.h line 358 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1086 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 523 The SW shall provide the possibility to write the SHE keys using the 0xEFC5 DID to the DCM.
Note: Refer section 13.2.2.1.2 of linked PTS document for more information. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20788 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20789
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/inc/ZenturHSM.h line 307 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1043 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 383 If the Key load is successful, The SW shall provide the possibility to read the SHE keys written status along with M4 and M5 HSM values using the 0xEFC5 DID to the DCM. In case of key load failure, the SW shall provide the possibility to read only the status bytes provided by 0xEFC5 DID to the DCM. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20789 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20790
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/inc/ZenturHSM.h line 257 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1064 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 444 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 481 If the Key load is successful, the SW shall provide the possibility to read the length of the SHE Key write status(2Bytes) along with M4 HSM(32Bytes) and M5 HSM(16Bytes) bytes provided by 0xEFC5 DID to the DCM, In case of Key load failure, the SW shall provide the possibility to read the length of only the status bytes(2 bytes) provided by 0xEFC5 DID to the DCM. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20790 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20791
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: shewrite_Write_Adaption_0xEFC5 ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 148 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 525 The Chorus HSM shall have exclusively write and read access to it's assigned HSM flash area.
Hint: This exclusive access can be achieved in configuring the respective DCF records to prevent the main cores from acessing HSM flash. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20791 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20793
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1087 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 526 The application software on Chorus allow the intialization of the SHE keys during production.
Note: The initialization of the SHE keys is described in the PTS (Product Test Specification) and is done using 0xEFC5 or 0x02C5 diagnose requests using information received from the KDM Server. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20793 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21446
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1108 Requirement is satisfied here: shewrite_checkm4m5 ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1117 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 527 The first byte is used to determine the KEY SLOT ID. If it is less than or equal to KEY_11 then the SHE KEYS shall be flashed inside the HSM in the COM_KEY_RANGE_STD.
The first byte is used to determine the KEY SLOT ID. If it is greater than KEY_11 & less than KEY_20 then the SHE KEYS shall be flashed inside the HSM in the COM_KEY_RANGE_EXTENDED ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21446 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21448
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: shewrite_checkm4m5 ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 608 Requirement is satisfied here: EbHsm_ReleaseChannelPolled ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1000 Requirement is satisfied here: shewrite_writenewkey_checkm4m5 ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1326 Requirement is satisfied here: EbHsm_VKMS_InjectIS_Key_WriteCheck ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1616 Requirement is satisfied here: EbHsm_VKMS_InjectIS_Key_WriteCheck ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1625 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 688 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 1075 Master ECU key(MASTER_ECU_KEY) only be updated if the existing Master ECU key is known. And update SHE KEY(KEY_<n>) only if the existing Master ECU KEY or SHE KEY itself is known.
As per the SHE specification(2009-04-01 SHE Functional Specification v1 1 (rev439).pdf). ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21448 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21447
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/inc/ZenturHSM.h line 508 Requirement is satisfied here: Vkms_shewrite_var_MsgM1toM5Copy ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1414 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 989 0xEFF2 Chorus VKMS2 Initial Key Provisioning inside the ICAS1Evo variant of the ECU.
Access: W Sessions: Extended Session Security Access: Conti EOL
Format:
WriteDataByIdentifier 2E EF F2 : In order to Write the VKMS IS Key writing in ECU
Purpose: The Diagnostic Routine in order to write VKMS Initial Key inside the CHORUS on ICas1evo
Short Description: This Diagnostic ID is used to provision the VKMS2 Initial Key write inside Chorus Icas1evo. The Diagnostic ID for writing the SHE-Cotainer inside the VKMS Key Range inside the EB ZenturHSM. Note : This routine is NOT FUNCTIONAL on ICAS1. This cannot be run on CHORUS 6M and on Escrypt Cycur HSM
Note: Refer section 13.2.2.1.4 of PTS document for more information. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21447 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21520
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/inc/ZenturHSM.h line 407 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/inc/ZenturHSM.h line 457 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1373 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/src/ZenturHSM.c line 1390 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 859 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/b_ar_asw/ZenturHSM/Evo/test/swut/ZenturHSM.c.test line 929 Access: R Sessions: Extended Session Security Access: Conti EOL
Format:
ReadDataByIdentifier 22 EF F2 : In order to read the correct status of the VKMS IS Key Writing
If the Key load is successful, the SW shall provide the possibility to read the length of the SHE Key write status(2Bytes) along with M4 HSM(32Bytes) and M5 HSM(16Bytes) bytes provided by 0xEFF2 DID to the DCM, In case of Key load failure, the SW shall provide the possibility to read the length of only the status bytes(2 bytes) provided by 0xEFF2 DID to the DCM. If the Key load is successful, The SW shall provide the possibility to read the SHE keys written status along with M4 and M5 HSM values using the 0xEFF2 DID to the DCM. In case of key load failure, the SW shall provide the possibility to read only the status bytes provided by 0xEFF2 DID to the DCM.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21520 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
